review_content: I ordered these for my husband for Christmas as he wanted a comfortable, slip-on shoe for home and gardening. He loves them. I have ordered him 3 more pairs in other colors for him to wear at home and going out. One of the pairs was a little tight getting on the first time, but they stretched out OK pretty quickly
So far, I‚Äôm happy with this purchase. The shoes are quite comfortable. The memory foam padding inside is quite luxurious.
This was a good looking shoe. I actually bought it for a beach wedding. (Pretty cool)
I purchased these for my Dad for Christmas. He loves them. says they are very comfortable. Would purchase again.
Good product materials and well constructed.

I like the looks of these shoes. They are pretty comfortable but just a little bit too large. I can still walk around in them without getting a blister on the heel, but I wish I had ordered them a half size smaller. Certainly not the company's fault.
My husband loves them. They are somewhat large, but comfortable. They are patted more so you don't feel gravel. But he wears them everywhere since he got them.
Great pair. Considering it's price, I am glad it is a good quality. Wore them last Friday and got a few compliments at the office. Comfortable for my feet and felt good to walk in them. Buy.
These are awesome shoes, very comfy and fit as expected with no hassle at all. Love the Army design too.
Fit is good ,will make acceptable daily walk around while doing my hobbies and projects

Absolutely Great! Perfect fit. True to size. Prompt service!
Love them, fit slightly large, but comfortable. Print very pretty, Pretty shoe.

I have bought several of your products now and love them all! Your customer service is beyond excellent! So far the boots and sneakers fit as sized. The slip ons ran a little big but not so much I could not wear them. I plan to order more shoes! Love all the fun colors and designs.
These shoes were a big hit! Not only are they so cute, word is they are very comfortable! Thanks!
very good thank you!
I bought them as a gift for my mom and she loves them!!!
Love them. So comfortable. Lots of comments when l wear them üòÉ

The company sent me the wrong size- too big - then resent another smaller pair, which are still a bit too big, but do fit OK with socks. They will need an arch support - they feel very flat through the arch. But the bottoms are nice for the boat and will hold securely on deck. The service rep was really nice on the phone. I haven't worn them yet, but I'll let you know how they feel after wearing them a few days.

I had ordered a pair of sneaker for myself as well as some boots and they are so comfortable!! I love them and I will order again. I ordered a pair of loafers for my sister's birthday and she screamed when she opened them and loves them!! You are guys/gals are the best!!! Thank you
I get too many compliments! I love the look, the style and the fit is just a wee bit large, but required inserts make it perfect. I recommend the shoes and boots.

It took a while to get these shoes, nearly 6 weeks, but they finally got here. I‚Äôm glad that I read other reviews that said the sizes were big, and ordered an 8 instead of a 9. They fit nicely. Color saturation matches the pictures on the site, and workmanship is high quality. I‚Äôm looking forward to dazzling my friends with my new kicks. And I might add another pair or two to my collection. They reflect my eccentricity quite well.
The shoes arrived on time and they fit perfect!! I love them. Next, the seat covers!! Thank you, Delphia Gomez

I received my shoes today and they fit great! I have a wide foot so the extra room was nice. I might could have worn a half size smaller in these. I ordered the Moon & Dreamcatcher design and I absolutely love them! Wore them to work and got compliments right away on them. The wait on shipping wasn't too bad, either. Will be buying more from Yes We Vibe!

These are adorable, but far too big in size. However, I called customer service and they did say they would send out another pair in a smaller size. Since my feet are a size 11, I don‚Äôt know anyone who wears my size, so I will simply donate them to a charity. I am still waiting for a size 10 in hopes they will fit.
I love my new shoes - they‚Äôre so comfortable. The design rocks - thank you.
Great! I love them. I fact, I am wearing them right now!

Well here is the honest truth. I was very close to returning the shoes. They are very cool looking but there is an issue with comfort. The rough edges of the elastic gores are very uncomfortable. I do not like to wear socks with my shoes but found a pair of lightweight socks helps eliminate the bad rubbing from those edges.
Sadly I can't use them as they are too big. I will be donating them to a local non-profit here on Maui.

I have bought several of your products now and love them all! Your customer service is beyond excellent! So far the boots and sneakers fit as sized. The slip ons ran a little big but not so much I could not wear them. I plan to order more shoes! Love all the fun colors and designs.

I love the boots, they are comfortable, well made, did not take as long as I expected to get. I did order a size larger because of reviews stating they run small but I should have ordered correct size, they are alittle big but I wear two socks and all is well.

review_title: HELLO, I LOVE MY BOOTS ! EVERYONE THAT SEES THEM THINKS THEY ARE AWESOME !

review_content: I love these shoes!!! They are lightweight, comfortable, and rock my peacefulness everywhere I go! I get compliments on them, even from complete strangers, and it's a great vibe!
Love the shoes! Bought boots before that and both pairs are extremely comfortable, wear well and look amazing!! Contemplating what my next pair will be.
